HARRISBURG, Pa. (WHTM) — Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro has issued a consumer alert and safety recommendations for potential misuse of Apple AirTags to track their locations and belongings without their knowledge or consent.

The company says they will rollout updates for the devices including new privacy warnings during AirTag setup, addressing alert issues for AirPods, increasing sound settings, and refining unwanted tracking alert logic.
